summary.para: The interface that should be implemented by a class which can be used as a tree map item.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.ITreeMapItem.Children

summary.para: Returns a collection of child items of the current item.

member.value: An object implementing the interface that is a list of child objects implementing the interface.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.ITreeMapItem.Label

summary.para: Returns the label text of the current item.

member.value: A string value that is the text label of the item.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.ITreeMapItem.Tag

summary.para: Returns the object that contains data related to the current item.

member.value: An object storing additional data about the item.

member.name: P:DevExpress.TreeMap.ITreeMapItem.Value

summary.para: Returns the value of the current item.

member.value: A value specifying the item value.
